message.content:
The likely categories for this paper are:

1) Books: The paper is discussing the fifth edition of "Meggs' History of Graphic Design," which is a book about graphic design history.

2) Arts, Crafts & Sewing: The paper is about the history of graphic design, which falls under the category of arts.

3) Office Products: The paper mentions that the last chapters of the book are difficult because graphic design history is changing almost daily, indicating that it is a reference book for professionals in the field.

4) Computers: The paper mentions that the new edition has additional coverage of multi-media and motion graphics, which are related to computer technology.

5) Electronics: The paper mentions that the new edition has additional coverage of multi-media and motion graphics, which are related to electronic media.

prompt:
Title: "Meggs' History of Graphic Design"
Content: Q&A with Author Alston W. PurvisWhat’s new in this edition?The fifth edition has additional coverage of the Middle East, Spain, Portugal, South America, and China as well as multi-media and motion graphics. Also, much in the last chapters is new, since graphic design history is changing almost daily. The last chapters are always the most difficult since we are living in the same period when things are happening.What are the biggest differences between the last edition and this new edit...

Give 5 likely categories as a comma-separated list ordered from most to least likely, and provide your reasoning.
